surface_layer.definition: A radiofrequency coil used to receive radiofrequency signals during an MRI examination.

deep_layer.mechanism: Detects the radiofrequency signals emitted by the precessing atomic nuclei in the subject's body.
deep_layer.origin: Part of the MRI system, designed for signal reception

epistemic_metadata.source: Extraction from Radiofrequency coil - Wikipedia, Basic Principles of and Practical Guide to Clinical MRI Radiofrequency Coils | RadioGraphics
